title: The March Revival — Unprecedented Movement of Early Bitcoin Hoards Move for the First Time in Years
description: As bitcoin’s value teeters on the brink of setting new price records, a significant batch of vintage bitcoins dating back from 2010 to 2017 has been transferred for the first time since their initial creation. Present data reveals that in the opening week of March 2024, a total of 4,237.73 ancient bitcoins, valued at over […]

title: UK starts process of imposing OECD’s crypto regulatory framework
description: Today, the United Kingdom officially made a move to incorporate the Organization for Economic Co-operation and Development’s (OECD) cryptocurrency reporting standards into its legal and fiscal framework. This came right after the country’s spring budget announcement. This crypto reporting system is expected to bring in a lot of money for the UK government, according to […]
